snippet.title: Wii - Disney Infinity Wii Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the official Disney Infinity Wii Trailer!  In Disney Infinity you have the freedom and endless opportunity to create stories and play experiences starring some of your favorite Disney and Disney/Pixar characters.
 
Discover three Play Sets, including Monsters University, Pirates of the Caribbean, and the Incredibles, with single player mode!  Create new adventures and discover a variety of toys to play with in six different Toy Boxes, with up to 2-player local co-op.  The possibilities are endless!

Official Site: https://infinity.disney.com/# 
Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Contact Us: http://www.nintendo.com/contact
Newsletter: http://www.nintendo.com/consumer/newsletters/
